name: Felix & Rover in Argh our spaceship is on fire
name_original: Felix & Rover in Argh our spaceship is on fire
description:
Argh your spaceship is on fire -- again -- and you have no arms. That big red button RIGHT THERE will fix it but -- again! -- you HAVE. NO. ARMS.

WTF, right?

Maybe that robot on that screen in front of you could help or something.

Supports the Facebook Oculus Facerift For Faces.

WASD or arrow keys to move and rotate the robot. If the indicator light next to a monitor is on, the robot is somewhere on that screen. Drive the robot to the button.

by @graeme & @newton64
